line.text: As a decrepit father takes delight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To see his active child do deeds of youth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So I made lame by Fortune dearest spite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Take all my comfort of thy worth and truth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For whether beauty birth or wealth or wit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Or any of these all or all or more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Entitled in thy parts do crowned sit
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: I make my love engrafted to this store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So then I am not lame poor nor despised
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst that this shadow doth such substance give
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That I in thy abundance am sufficed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And by a part of all thy glory live
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Look what is best that best I wish in thee
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: This wish I have then ten times happy me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
